scriptItem.label: LV Cache Size Comment
scriptItem.scriptCode: from imp import reload import LVNodes reload(LVNodes) LVNodes.comment_cache_size(kwargs)

scriptItem.label: LV Transfer Transform

scriptItem.label: LV Transfer Transform
scriptItem.scriptCode: from imp import reload import LVRenderUtils reload(LVRenderUtils) LVRenderUtils.fix_output(kwargs)

scriptItem.label: LV Shader Switch to Materials
scriptItem.scriptCode:
from imp import reload import LVMatUtils reload(LVMatUtils)
LVMatUtils.shader_switch_to_mat(kwargs)
